questions.question: Choose the correct order for the sentence: late / is / he / sometimes

choices.answer: Is late he sometimes
He is sometimes late.
Late sometimes he is.
He is late sometimes.

questions.question: Choose the correct order :  early / up / sister / never / Sundays / on / gets / my

choices.answer: My sister never gets up early on Sundays.
On Sundays never my sister gets up early.
My sister gets up early never on Sundays.
Never my sister gets up early on Sundays.

questions.question: Choose the correct order: usually / he / goes / to / on / Fridays / the / cinema

choices.answer: He goes usually to the cinema on Fridays.
On Fridays he goes usually to the cinema.
To the cinema on Fridays he goes usually.
He usually goes to the cinema on Fridays.

questions.question: Choose the correct order: go / you / restaurant / often / a / do / how / to / ?

choices.answer: Do you go how often to a restaurant?
How often do you go to a restaurant?
How do you often go to a restaurant?
Do you go to a restaurant how often?

questions.question: Choose the correct order: she / the / beach / to / always / goes / in / the / summer

choices.answer: Always she goes to the beach in the summer.
She goes always to the beach in the summer.
She always goes to the beach in the summer.
She goes to the beach always in the summer.

questions.question: Choose the correct order: sometimes / her / does / she / Fridays / on / shopping

choices.answer: She does sometimes her shopping on Fridays.
Her shopping on Fridays she does sometimes.
She does her shopping sometimes on Fridays.
She sometimes does her shopping on Fridays.

questions.question: Choose the correct order: go / we / twice / month / the / theatre / to / a

choices.answer: We go to the theater twice a month.
To the theater twice a month we go.
We go twice to the theater a month.
Twice a month to the theater we go.

questions.question: Choose the correct order: never / in / is / the / at / mornings / Peter / home

choices.answer: Peter never is at home in the mornings.
Never at home Peter is in the mornings.
Peter is never at home in the mornings.
At home Peter is never in the mornings.

questions.question: Choose the correct order: he / work / rides / bike / to  / his / often

choices.answer: He often rides his bike to work.
He rides his bike often to work.
His bike he rides often to work.
He rides often his bike to work.

questions.question: Choose the correct order: home / they / get / six o’clock / usually / at

choices.answer: They get usually home at six o'clock.
They usually get home at six o'clock.
Usually at home they get at six o'clock.
At home they usually get at six o'clock.

questions.question: Put the adverb in the correct place: Susan is late for school. (never)

choices.answer: Susan never is late for school.
Susan is never late for school.
Never Susan is late for school.
For school never is Susan late.

questions.question: My brother doesn’t write letters to his friends. (usually)

choices.answer: My brother doesn't usually write letters to his friends.
My brother doesn't write usually letters to his friends.
My brother usually doesn't write letters to his friends.
My brother doesn't write letters usually to his friends.

questions.question: We go on holidays. (twice a year)

choices.answer: We twice a year go on holidays.
We go twice a year on holidays.
We go on holidays twice a year.
Twice a year on holidays we go.

questions.question: Peter wears a tie. (sometimes)

choices.answer: Peter wears a tie sometimes.
Peter sometimes wears a tie.
Sometimes a tie Peter wears.
Peter wears sometimes a tie.

questions.question: I eat fish. (once a week)

choices.answer: I eat once a week fish.
I eat fish once a week.
Once a week fish I eat.
I once a week eat fish.

questions.question: Do the children watch TV? (often)

choices.answer: Do the children watch often TV?
Do the children often watch TV?
How often do the children watch TV?

questions.question: My father is very busy. (always)

choices.answer: Always my father is very busy.
My father is very busy always.
My father is always very busy.
My father always is very busy.

questions.question: My brother and I go fishing. (every week)

choices.answer: My brother and I go fishing every week.
My brother every week and I go fishing.
My brother and  every week go fishing.

choices.answer: My mother goes always shopping on Saturdays.
My mother always goes shopping on Saturdays.
My mother goes shopping always on Saturdays.

choices.answer: Usually do you get up late at the weekend?
Do you get up late usually at the weekend?
